questions.question: How do I tie my shoes?
questions.answer: You bend over and tie them.

questions.question: How do I open an account?
questions.answer: You go to de bank and ask dem

questions.question: Spaghetti fall out of pockets, what do?
questions.answer: You bend over and tie them.
